description: This a really great way to use the dressing. A classic schnitzel without the deep-frying or cleaning. Coating meat and vegetables with the dressing is a simple and effective way of layering flavour easily.
name: Herb And Pranko Crusted Beef Rump Steak Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: few sprigs of fresh oregano leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Heat frying/griddle pan medium to high add 1 tbsp. olive oil.
Season steak and cook to your liking - 4 to 6 minutes medium-rare. Rest steak for 6 minutes.

In a clean frying pan heat olive oil on medium. Add MasterFoodsTM breadcrumbs crumbs and MasterFoodsTM oregano and stir until toasted golden, around 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat and toss in the lemon zest.
Slice the rested steak into strips, keeping together in the original shape. Coat evenly with a thin layer of dressing mixture and liberally sprinkle over the herb crust all over until well covered.
Serve with extra Caesar dressing on the side.
